mainTitle: Pan Africa Group (PAG) | Gulf-East Africa Commercial Platform
subheading: Pan Africa Group LLC (PAG) is a Dubai-based commercial platform serving Gulf-East Africa mandates. We align partners, coordinate sourcing pathways, and support delivery within defined regulatory and contractual boundaries.
positioningParagraphs: PAG connects international partners, regional institutions, and independent local operators across infrastructure, trade, mobility, technology, and industrial mandates.
We do not operate as a product company.
We do not position ourselves around a single vertical.
We operate as a disciplined commercial architecture layer between markets.

coreCapabilities.title: Market Entry & Partnership Structuring
coreCapabilities.description: Supporting international entities entering East Africa through local positioning, partner alignment, and commercial pathway design.

coreCapabilities.title: Strategic Trade & Cross-Border Sourcing
coreCapabilities.description: Coordinating supplier relationships and sourcing programs across Gulf-East Africa corridors.

coreCapabilities.title: Opportunity Development & Mandate Coordination
coreCapabilities.description: Identifying viable mandates and aligning multi-party stakeholders within clear operating structures.

institutionalOrientationText: PAG operates within a governance environment aligned with its jurisdictions of incorporation and operation. For mandate discussions and institutional collaboration, contact our corporate office.
